name: 2 Day Test Gamejam
description:
This was a game that I made in two days to test myself of my capabilities. It's my first attempt at a game where I wasn't following tutorials so please be nice in the comments if you do leave one. working on the next game already! I'm uploading this so that in the years to come I can look back and be happy with how much progress I've made.

TL;DR I made myself do this like a game jam where i gave myself 42 hours to complete a game. This is the best i could do being my first attempt at a game.
